channel.title: Website on The Clinical Brain Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Website on The Clinical Brain Lab

item.title: Welcome to the New Website!
item.description: Hi everyone! We’ve just shifted from the old CBL website to a github-based one to allow for easier collaboration and resource-sharing! As there are several ongoing projects in the lab, we believe it will be more efficient in the long-run if everyone gets on board with updating the website, be it modifying your profile, adding new publications, or putting up recruitment calls for research participants - and hosting the website on GitHub will be the most optimal in achieving this.
